select md5(uuid()) id, orderDtl.id orderDtlId, orderDtl.parent_id parentId, orderDtl.state state, orderDtl.product_id productId, orderDtl.order_unit orderUnit,
DATE_FORMAT(orderDtl.deliver_date,'%Y-%m-%d') deliverDate, orderDtl.remark remark, round(ifnull(orderDtl.order_count, 0),2) orderCount, round(ifnull(orderDtl.lock_count, 0),2) lockCount, CASE WHEN orderDtl.state = '0' THEN '待提交' WHEN orderDtl.state = '1' THEN '待审核' WHEN orderDtl.state = '2' THEN '待生产' WHEN orderDtl.state = '3' THEN '待出库' WHEN orderDtl.state = '4' THEN '待发货' WHEN orderDtl.state = '5' THEN '已完成' WHEN orderDtl.state = '-1' THEN '已取消' ELSE null END stateName,
round(ifnull(deliverDtl.count, 0), 2) endDeliverCount,
round(ifnull(retreatDtl.count, 0), 2) endRetreatCount,
orderDtl.is_need_purchase isNeedPurchase,
saleOrder.sys_code sysCode, customer.name customerName, DATE_FORMAT(saleOrder.order_date,'%Y-%m-%d') orderDate, DATE_FORMAT(saleOrder.expect_date,'%Y-%m-%d') expectDate,
CASE WHEN planDtlChild.plan_dtl_id is not null THEN '已排产' WHEN planDtlChild.plan_dtl_id is null or CHAR_LENGTH(TRIM(planDtlChild.plan_dtl_id)) = 0 THEN '未排产' ELSE null END producePlanName,
product.code sysProductCode, product.source_code custProductCode, CASE WHEN product.source_code is null THEN product.code WHEN product.source_code is not null THEN product.source_code ELSE null END productCode, product.name productName, product.spec productSpec, product.property productProperty, product.genre productGenre, round(ifnull(product.safety_count, 0), 2) safetyCount,
prodUnit.unit prodUnitId, prodUnitName.name prodUnitName,
orderUnit.name orderUnitName, prodUnitPrice.np_formula n2pFormula, prodUnitPrice.n2p_is_scale n2pIsScale, prodUnitPrice.n2p_decimal_count n2pDecimalCount,
prodUnitPrice.pn_formula p2nFormula, prodUnitPrice.p2n_is_scale p2nIsScale, prodUnitPrice.p2n_decimal_count p2nDecimalCount,
round((ifnull(product.stock_count, 0) - ifnull(product.lock_count, 0) + ifnull(orderDtl.lock_count, 0)),2) allowStockCount,
'' purchasePlanCount, '' minPlanCount
from vmes_sale_order_detail orderDtl left join vmes_sale_order saleOrder on orderDtl.parent_id = saleOrder.id left join vmes_customer customer on saleOrder.customer_id = customer.id
left join vmes_product product on orderDtl.product_id = product.id left join vmes_dictionary orderUnit on orderDtl.order_unit = orderUnit.id left join vmes_product_unit prodUnitPrice on (orderDtl.product_id = prodUnitPrice.product_id and orderDtl.order_unit = prodUnitPrice.unit)
left join vmes_product_unit prodUnit on orderDtl.product_id = prodUnit.product_id and prodUnit.type = 1 left join vmes_dictionary prodUnitName on prodUnit.unit = prodUnitName.id
left join vmes_purchase_plan_detail_child planDtlChild on orderDtl.id = planDtlChild.sale_order_dtl_id
left join ( select order_detai_id, sum(order_count) count from vmes_sale_deliver_detail where state = '1' group by order_detai_id ) deliverDtl on orderDtl.id = deliverDtl.order_detai_id
left join ( select order_detail_id, sum(order_count) count from vmes_sale_retreat_detail where state = '3' group by order_detail_id ) retreatDtl on orderDtl.id = retreatDtl.order_detail_id
and orderDtl.id in (${orderDtlIds})
and orderDtl.parent_id = #{parentId}
and orderDtl.state in (${inOrderDtlState})
and saleOrder.company_id = #{currentCompanyId}
and saleOrder.sys_code = #{sysCode}
and customer.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT(#{customerName}),'%')
and planDtlChild.plan_dtl_id is not null
and (planDtlChild.plan_dtl_id is null or CHAR_LENGTH(TRIM(planDtlChild.plan_dtl_id)) = 0)
and orderDtl.is_need_purchase = '1'
and (is_need_purchase = '0' or (is_need_purchase is null or CHAR_LENGTH(TRIM(is_need_purchase)) = 0))
order by ${orderStr}
